posts.post_content: title says it all.  You know what I am after.  If you got one I need for the registry under $100 let me know what you got.

Hi Andrew,

I have a PSA AUT t205 Leach with a Broadleaf back.  It has a torn corner but is actually nice aside from that.  Let me know if you have any interest.

Brian
